name: Hroldar "Whitefin"

aspects.high_concept: Knife-Smart Courier Node for the Ivory Thread
other_aspects: Knows the Passes, Knows the Prices
A Smile That Never Reaches the Eyes

stunts: Dead-Drop Protocol: +2 to Contacts when arranging or locating a hidden exchange point (dead drop, coded pickup, relay handoff).
Border Runner: Once per scene, ignore a single minor obstacle from terrain/patrol routing when traveling (treat as having an appropriate tool/route).
Codephrase Cutter: +2 to Deceive to confirm identity or intent using passphrases, countersigns, or layered meanings.
notes: Hroldar "Whitefin" is a Pale-born courier who operates as a node in the Ivory Thread—an off-book delivery lattice that moves people, paper, and secrets through Skyrim's seams. He's not loyal to causes; he's loyal to survival, leverage, and whoever pays without bringing heat to his doorstep. Maven uses people like him when she wants plausible deniability. The Arisann lead points to him as a controlled choke-point: he either knows where Arisann went, who hired the transfer, or which relay received the next handoff.
combat_tactics: Avoids straight fights. Uses the environment, retreats, takes a shot only if it clears his escape. Will bargain mid-conflict if it buys him time.
social_interaction: Low-voice, transactional, tests you with half-truths. He respects competence and punishes sloppiness. If you sound like you know the underworld, he opens up; if you sound like a hero, he weaponizes that.

relationships.Maven Black-Briar: Client-by-proxy; respects her reach, fears her attention
relationships.Thalmor: Avoids at all costs; assumes they always pay in blood

dialogue_samples.greeting: If you're here for a story, find a bard. If you're here for a delivery… choose your words carefully.
dialogue_samples.passphrase_prompt: Say it. The line you were given. Then I'll decide if you're worth the air you're spending.
dialogue_samples.approval: Alright. You're not stupid. That's rarer than gold these days.
dialogue_samples.warning: If you brought heat to my door, I'll sell you to the cold just to watch you shiver.
dialogue_samples.offer: Information costs. Silence costs more. Which one are you buying?
